AssociateCoupon.name: AssociateCoupon
AssociateCoupon.description:
Grants permission to associate a DeepComposer coupon (or DSN) with the account associated
                                                with the sender of the request

CreateAudio.name: CreateAudio
CreateAudio.description:
Grants permission to create an audio file by converting the midi composition into
                                                a wav or mp3 file

CreateComposition.name: CreateComposition
CreateComposition.description: Grants permission to create a multi-track midi composition

CreateModel.name: CreateModel
CreateModel.description:
Grants permission to start creating/training a generative-model that is able to perform
                                                inference against the user-provided piano-melody to create a multi-track midi composition

DeleteComposition.name: DeleteComposition
DeleteComposition.description: Grants permission to delete the composition

DeleteModel.name: DeleteModel
DeleteModel.description: Grants permission to delete the model

GetComposition.name: GetComposition
GetComposition.description: Grants permission to get information about the composition

GetModel.name: GetModel
GetModel.description: Grants permission to get information about the model

GetSampleModel.name: GetSampleModel
GetSampleModel.description: Grants permission to get information about the sample/pre-trained DeepComposer model

ListCompositions.name: ListCompositions
ListCompositions.description: Grants permission to list all the compositions owned by the sender of the request

ListModels.name: ListModels
ListModels.description: Grants permission to list all the models owned by the sender of the request

ListSampleModels.name: ListSampleModels
ListSampleModels.description:
Grants permission to list all the sample/pre-trained models provided by the DeepComposer
                                                service

ListTagsForResource.name: ListTagsForResource
ListTagsForResource.description: Grants permission to list tags for a resource

ListTrainingTopics.name: ListTrainingTopics
ListTrainingTopics.description:
Grants permission to list all the training options or topic for creating/training
                                                a model

TagResource.name: TagResource
TagResource.description: Grants permission to tag a resource

UntagResource.name: UntagResource
UntagResource.description: Grants permission to untag a resource

UpdateComposition.name: UpdateComposition
UpdateComposition.description: Grants permission to modify the mutable properties associated with a composition

UpdateModel.name: UpdateModel
UpdateModel.description: Grants permission to to modify the mutable properties associated with a model
